name: 許豐益
objective:
導論及AI之工業應用、搜尋法則、邏輯推理、機器學習與電腦視覺。並使用Python 實作驗證AI演算法。
Introduction of AI in industrial applications, Searching algorithm, Logical reasoning, Machine learning. Implementation of AI algorithms by Python programming.
schedule:
unit 1: Introduction
unit 2: Python Language
unit 3: Classic Search
unit 4: Adversarial Search
unit 5: Logical Reasoning
unit 6: Machine Learning
unit 7: Computer Vision
materials:
書名：Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach, 3/e, Stuart Russell , Peter Norvig ,Prentice Hall
*Lecture files (ppt/pdt) available
